item.title: github flavored markdown
item.description: Overview GitHub-Flavored Markdown is an extended markdown syntax by GitHub. Collapsible Sections <details><summary>CLICK ME</summary> <p> #### We can hide anything, even code! ```ruby puts "Hello World" \``` </p> </details> CLICK ME We can hide anything, even code! puts "Hello World" Code Blocks See also: linguist/languages.yml at master Â· github/linguist ``` function test() { console.log("notice the blank line before this function?"); } ``` Syntax Highlighting ```ruby require 'redcarpet' markdown = Redcarpet.new("Hello World!
